Package org.wildfly.security.credential.store.impl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CmdPasswordStore
    Pseudo credential store which is able to get credential from output of executed program.
    CommandCredentialStore
    Base class for all command line based CredentialStoreSpi.
    ExecPasswordStore
    Pseudo credential store which is able to get credential from output of executed program.
    KeystorePasswordStore
    Keystore based ClearPassword password storage used in default Elytron Vault implementation.
    KeystorePasswordStore.Entry
    Versioned entry of KeystorePasswordStore.
    MaskedPasswordStore
    Pseudo credential store which is able to get credential from masked password string.
    SecretKeyWrap
    Class to wrap byte[] to be able to store it in KeyStore
